title: Manage Process Priorities for Performance
description: Adjust CPU priority for background jobs vs interactive processes

steps.instruction: Lower priority of background worker PID 5678
steps.expected_outcome: Worker process priority lowered from 0 to 10

steps.instruction: Verify all worker processes and their priorities
steps.expected_outcome: All 5 workers running with varied nice values

steps.instruction: Monitor system to confirm priority changes effective
steps.expected_outcome: Interactive processes getting more CPU time

success_criteria: Worker processes deprioritized, system responsive to interactive tasks
